benchmark_details.name: वाक् सञ्चयः (/Vāksañcayah ̣/)
benchmark_details.overview: We present a new, large vocabulary Sanskrit ASR system and the first ever ASR-based study for Sanskrit using a new, large and diverse, labeled speech corpus वाक् सञ्चयः (/Vāksañcayah ̣/).

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To introduce a large vocabulary ASR system for Sanskrit and analyze different modeling choices for acoustic and language models in ASR systems.

data.source: The dataset is collected from various sources including volunteer recordings and online resources.
data.size: 78 hours of speech covering about 46,000 sentences
data.annotation: Transcribed by volunteers using oTranscribe and other tools.

methodology.calculation: WER and CER are computed based on the ASR output compared to the ground truth transcripts.
methodology.interpretation: Lower WER/CER indicates better performance of the ASR system.
methodology.validation: The ASR system was validated using separate validation and test datasets.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: Analysis includes variances from multiple native language speakers.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: Informed consent obtained from all speakers involved in recordings.
